entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
